settings.title: Humanist sans-serifs
settings.body: Use friendly, readable sans-serifs (GT America, Söhne, Akkurat) instead of geometric faces.

settings.title: Generous line height
settings.body: Body copy sits at 1.6–1.8 line-height for calm breathing room.

settings.title: Moderate scale
settings.body: Hierarchy is clear but gentle—no dramatic size jumps.

settings.title: Warm serifs for editorial
settings.body: Freight Text, Lyon Text, Tiempos, or Garamond for long-form content.

settings.title: Letter spacing
settings.body: Add subtle tracking to uppercase or small text for breathing room.

settings.title: Soft hierarchy
settings.body: Size, weight, and color shifts remain understated to keep the page calm.

settings.title: Font palette
settings.body: Sans: GT America, Söhne, Akkurat. Serifs: Freight Text, Lyon Text, Tiempos. Avoid overly cold Helvetica and geometric sans.
